Shops.Quote: Welcome to Durin's Pub! Stay a while, and listen!
Shops.ClosedMessage: Come back when Durin is tending the shop.
Come back when the Dwarven Robot Teller is awake (9am-5pm).

Shops.Quote: Buy some shoes, or boot it!
Shops.ClosedMessage: Come back when Edrus is tending the shop.

Shops.Quote: The very finest Elven silks. Caps and gowns for the adventurer and nobleman alike!
Shops.ClosedMessage: Come back when Arwen is tending the shop.
Come back when the Dwarven Robot Teller is awake (9am-5pm).

Shops.Quote: By my hammer! Also, buy my hammer...
Shops.ClosedMessage: Come back when Glorgan is tending the shop.
Come back when the Dwarven Robot Teller is awake (9am-5pm).

Shops.Quote: Grow your own little slice of heaven, or buy it, buying it works too!
Shops.ClosedMessage: Come back when Balor is tending the shop.

Shops.Quote: Exchange your boring old gold for a sack of glittering Durbloons!
